statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

article.description: Lopez, Sadler lead Rider past Fairfield, 62-46
article.headline: Lopez, Sadler lead Rider past Fairfield, 62-46
article.linkText: Lopez, Sadler lead Rider past Fairfield, 62-46
article.story: BRIDGEPORT, Conn. -- Matt Lopez had 14 points and grabbed 12 rebounds, and Zedric Sadler scored 14 more to help Rider beat Fairfield 62-46 on Monday night. A jumper by Jerome Segura cut the Fairfield deficit to 12-11 with 10:09 left in the first half, but Rider (9-6, 3-1 Metro Atlantic Athletic Conference) closed the half on a 12-2 run as the Stags (4-10, 2-2) went scoreless for more than 9 minutes and trailed 24-13 at halftime. Fairfield made just 5 of 24 field goals, including 1 of 10 from 3-point range, in the first half. Back-to-back 3-pointers by Shawn Valentine and Sadler gave Rider its biggest lead of the game, 44-28, with 12 minutes left. Amadou Sidibe scored eight during a 17-7 run which pulled Fairfield within six, 51-45, with 4 minutes to play, but Rider closed the game with an 11-1 run. Marcus Gilbert led Fairfield with 17 points. Sidibe finished with 12 and 15 rebounds.
